articles.description: South Africa face New Zealand in the Champions Trophy semi-final in Lahore - follow live cricket scores, text updates, in-play video clips and radio commentary
articles.title: Champions Trophy LIVE: South Africa v New Zealand, semi-final, Lahore – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights & updates

articles.description: Fifa are set to give more than $1bn in revenue to clubs, which is believed to be a record sum, for its summer Club World Cup.
articles.title: Club World Cup: Fifa give $1bn as Europe nears deal

articles.description: Elliot Daly will start ahead of Marcus Smith at full-back for England's match against Italy on Sunday, with the Harlequins playmaker dropped to the bench.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: England v Italy - Marcus Smith drops to bench with Elliot Daly at 15

articles.description: Liverpool face a Paris St-Germain side in the Champions League who are hitting their best form of the post-Kylian Mbappe era.
articles.title: Paris St-Germain vs Liverpool: PSG's post-Mbappe era, no 'clans' & foreign stars' French buy-in

articles.description: Coldplay will work alongside Fifa to decide a "set of artists" to perform a half-time show at the 2026 World Cup final.
articles.title: Coldplay to help decide 2026 World Cup final half-time show performers

articles.description: Three-time Super Bowl winner Travis Kelce says he will continue playing for the Kansas City Chiefs in the 2025 season.
articles.title: Travis Kelce: Kansas City Chiefs tight end will continue playing in 2025 season

articles.description: The Football Association says Millwall keeper Liam Roberts' three-match ban for a challenge on Crystal Palace striker Jean-Philippe Mateta is "clearly insufficient".
articles.title: Liam Roberts: FA wants Millwall goalkeeper's ban to be extended

articles.description: Six-time Olympic medallist Adam Peaty is not included in the group of elite swimmers that will be supported by Aquatics GB throughout 2025.
articles.title: Peaty omitted from GB's world-class programme for 2025

articles.description: England captain Heather Knight criticises the widening gap between the top men's and women's salaries in the The Hundred.
articles.title: The Hundred: England captain Heather Knight says gender pay gap 'looks bad'

articles.description: Tiger Woods is a doubt for the Players Championship after saying his "heart is really not into practising right now".
articles.title: Players Championship: Tiger Woods 'heart not into practising' before Florida tournament
